english.segment1: So here I go again, again. Ive let myself get spread so thin. I can see right through my skin. And I dont like what Im finding in my heart. So many different voices call. And I try hard to please them all. I run in circles til I fall. So Im falling on my knees and praying
english.segment2: Please, please, please only You, only You. Please, please, please take my heart and make it true. Let everything I say and everything I do. Please, please only You. Please only You
english.segment3: For every moment of my time. For every thought that fills my mind. For every melody and rhyme. This is the prayer that Ill be praying
